summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of HRMS Premium UI/UX Redesign. All pages render correctly with premium glassmorphism sidebar, bento grid layouts, charts integration, amber/gold Star Reward theme, and proper modal interactions. Visual redesign maintains all existing functionality.

critical_code_review_comments: The UI redesign is comprehensive and professional. All pages maintain consistent styling with the premium theme.
Minor: Console shows 'Missing Description or aria-describedby' for some DialogContent components - consider adding DialogDescription for accessibility in all modals
context_for_next_testing_agent: Full HRMS Premium UI/UX Redesign verified working. All pages tested: Login, Dashboard, Employees, Attendance, Leave, Star Reward (Table, Grid, Teams views with View History modal), Team, Payroll (Attendance/Salary views), Reports. Navigation, modals, forms, filters, and actions all working correctly.

highlights: Bento grid layouts with proper spacing
Consistent amber/gold theme for Star Rewards
Proper status badge colors (success, warning, error)
Premium card styles with subtle shadows and hover effects
Proper typography with Outfit headings and Public Sans body
design_review.mobile_considerations: Sidebar responsive with mobile menu button
design_review.accessibility: data-testid attributes present on all interactive elements
